basic.description:
An exploration of approaches to 'community' and 'society' in British thought and culture from the late 18th to the early 20th century.
LEARNING HOURS    360 (72S;288P)
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: British Culture and Society, 1780-1914

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    A Grade of C+ in 6.0 units from HIST 300-329 and registration in a HIST Major or Medial Plan.
